main event: A bright, white, wheel-shaped object was observed at high speed over Taichung, Formosa on 20 Dec 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as 10 times brighter than stars., The observation lasted for 10 minutes., White material was reported to be dripping to the northwest., The object was seen fading to the northeast during its flight., Insufficient information was noted for further evaluation.
witness description: variety of sources including Chinese Nationalist sources
